p: Flaviviruses carry out their life cycle by utilizing machinery and functions of the host cell [ 12]. Consequently, flavivirusâ€“host cell interactions are essential for the pathogenesis. Many of these crucial interactions, however, remain elusive. In this Review, we focus on ZIKV, a member of the Flaviviridae family, and highlight the viral pathogenesis at the level of cellular mechanisms and interactions.
